content: rupert the duck can be a bit bossy but he always knows how to make his friends laugh and lighten the mood he s a good companion and the best listener he likes to be able to sit up high and keep an eye on the whole farm to make sure everyone is living their best life this lovey comes together in no time so rupert will be ready to gift pretty quickly this listing is for rupert s pattern only if you d also like the patterns for his besties- wesley the pony and spike the pig check out the bundle download details skill level-advanced beginner written in us terms supplies needed- any worsted weight yarn approx 220 yds per pattern g/6 4 25mm and j/10 6 0mm hook polyfil stuffing special stitches- shell finished size should be approximately 19 wide x 13 tall
